meaning_str.bing:
adj. 令人失望的；令人沮丧的；令人扫兴的
v. “disappoint”的现在分词
网络. 使人失望的；让人失望的；感到失望的

令人失望的；令人沮丧的；令人扫兴的
使人失望的；让人失望的；感到失望的

令人失望的；令人沮丧的；令人扫兴的；让人不满意的；令人不快的
使失望；使落空；使破灭；（disappoint的现在分词）

1.en: So, I was really just super excited to go and then, it was just really disappointing when I got to the corner. . .
1.cn: 所以我对能来超级激动，然后我只得到一个角落的位置真的失望…

2.en: It was disappointing not to be able to see her.
2.cn: 不能见到她真令人失望。

3.en: "Another fan said: " Although he's a little out of control behavior, but on the court, he never disappointing .
3.cn: 另一名球迷说道：“虽然他的行为有点失控，不过在球场上，他从不让人失望。”

0.en: Yes, disappointing fathers. Tell me about it. I remember for my 16th birthday, my dad bought me a Mercedes.
0.cn: 是啊，令人失望的父亲们。可不是咋的。我还记得我16岁生日，我爸给我买了奔驰。

3.en: Our surest way of disappointing him will be to ask nothing about it.
3.cn: 让他失望是最好的办法，什么都不问他。

4.en: But so often, they turn out to be, I don't know, disappointing and stupid.
4.cn: 但是，她们总变得，我不知道，让人失望，变得愚蠢。

5.en: Better than God's Cauldron, I hope. Sales were disappointing, weren't they?
5.cn: 我希望比《上帝之釜》要好，销量不高，是吗？

6.en: And suffered the same fate. It's a disappointing end to her story, isn't it?
6.cn: 结果落得相同的下场，真是个令人遗憾的结局，对吧？

7.en: Well, that's disappointing. I've always wanted to be invited to a slumber party.
7.cn: 太让人失望了，我一直都想被人邀请去睡衣派对的。

8.en: In fact, they've been disappointing on everything you've written the past ten years.
8.cn: 事实上，你过去十年写的每一本书销量都不高。

9.en: Anyway, you ended up disappointing me more than, more than any of the other silly girls.
9.cn: 总之，你却比其他任何蠢女孩都更让我感到失望。

10.en: No, no, he would never be that disappointing. He's planned something, something long-term.
10.cn: 不，不，他不会那么让人失望的，他肯定计划好了什么，长期计划。

11.en: I've had a long and rather disappointing day, so yeah, I should probably get to sleep now.
11.cn: 我今天累了，也有点儿失望，或许该睡了。

12.en: I'm afraid you may find us disappointing guests if you want us to stay up till two in the morning being witty.
12.cn: 我们俩昨晚熬到凌晨两点，恐怕今天是做不到风趣诙谐了。

13.en: And next. If either of us ever invents time travel, we agree our first stop will be this meeting today in precisely five seconds. Okay. That's disappointing.
13.cn: 下一条，如果我们之中任何一人发明了时空穿梭机，我们同意第一站就是回到今天这个会议，时间是5秒之后。好。真可惜。

14.en: As I was saying, you and Leonard had a disappointing sexual encounter. Earlier this evening, Leonard characterized as just fine. So what you're seeing here is a continuation of the mocking that followed.
14.cn: 言归正传，你和莱纳德的性爱比较失望。今天傍晚，莱纳德将其描述为“挺好”，所以你看到的只是嘲笑的后续篇。
